sql.query: select top 20 indate, seq_no, CASE srvc_cd WHEN 'A' THEN '고객정보변경' WHEN 'B' THEN '자동이체변경' WHEN 'C' THEN '자동이체해지' WHEN 'D' THEN '그룹빌링' WHEN 'E' THEN '약대자동상환' WHEN 'F' THEN 'APL자동상환' WHEN 'G' THEN '납주변경' WHEN 'H' THEN '변액보험펀드변경' WHEN 'I' THEN 'APL신청' WHEN 'J' THEN 'APL해지' WHEN 'K' THEN 'SNC특부신청' WHEN 'L' THEN 'LNB특부신청' WHEN 'M' THEN 'FNB특부신청' WHEN 'N' THEN '동의철회/수신거부' END as srvc_cd, policy,intime, ssn, owner, prdate, prtime, ssn, isnull(email_cus_status,'') as email_cus_status, isnull(email_lp_status,'') as email_lp_status, isnull(sms_cus_ststus,'') as sms_cus_status, isnull(sms_lp_status,'') as sms_lp_status, CASE status WHEN '0' THEN '즉시처리' WHEN '' THEN '접수' WHEN '1' THEN '일괄처리' WHEN '3' THEN '반송' WHEN '2' THEN '실패' END as status, srvc_cd as srvc_code from cyber.dbo.CYBER_TBL_wb_master where indate+convert(varChar(1000),seq_no,1) is not null $where and indate+convert(varChar(1000),seq_no,1) not in ( select top $page indate+convert(varChar(1000),seq_no,1) from cyber.dbo.CYBER_TBL_wb_master where indate is not null $subwhere order by indate desc, intime desc ) order by indate desc, intime desc

mapping.getProperty: indate, seq_no, srvc_cd, policy, intime, ssn, owner, prdate, prtime, ssn, email_cus_status, email_lp_status, sms_cus_status, sms_lp_status,status, srvc_code
